## GetSubTuple type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type GetSubTuple<
  L extends number,
  V,
  R extends readonly unknown[] = []
> = R['length'] extends L ? [...R, V] : GetSubTuple<L, V, [...R, V]>
```
